Docs.summary: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.
Gets the number of columns in a grid.
Docs.value: The total number of columns in a grid.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Hidden rows and columns, depending on the provider implementation, may be loaded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree and will therefore be reflected in the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern.GridPatternInformation.RowCount%2A> and ColumnCount properties. If the hidden rows and columns have not yet been loaded they are not counted.
The default value is 0.
## Examples In the following example, an event listener is set up for a grid structure change such as a row or column grid item being added or removed from the grid.
